title: Pending Approvals Schema
description: Schema for tracking actions that require manual approval before execution

id.description: Unique identifier for this approval request (e.g., 'docker-volume-cleanup-2025-12-27')

created.description: When this approval request was created

action.description: Command or script to execute when approved

risk_level.description: Risk level of executing this action

estimated_impact.description: Expected impact (e.g., '1.1GB disk space reclaimed', '5 minutes downtime')

reversible.description: Whether this action can be easily reversed

related_alert_id.description: ID of related alert in alerts.json (if any)

status.description: Current status of this approval request

approved_at.description: When this was approved (null if not approved)

approved_by.description: Username or identifier of who approved (null if not approved)

user_comment.description: User's comment/instructions when approving or denying

execution_started.description: When execution started (null if not started)

execution_completed.description: When execution completed (null if not completed)

execution_output.description: Output from executing the action (null if not executed)

execution_error.description: Error message if execution failed (null if no error)
